page.title: 04POPULATION COUNT/ AGE RATIO
page.content: The population is concentrated in the villages of Beachampton and Nash. For the purpose of this survey a part of Beachampton and Wood End in Nash is excluded. There are 151 dwellings which include two public houses and the farms. The population is 430 but there is some increase in the summer when the farmers employ extra staff. The approximate ratio of ages of the residents is as follows: Nash Beachampton 0- 4 21 4 5-16 47 28 17-60 167 69 over 60 41 20 Some families have lived locally for generations many of the older residents having spent all their life in the villages. The new houses in Nash have attracted young families.
